ca vAqjina$M || 
sOmaq(gm)q rAjA#naqM ~Mvaru#Namaqgni-maqnvAra#BAmahE | 
AqdiqtyAn viShNuq(gm)q sUrya#M braqhmANa#M caq bRuhaqspati$M || 
dEqvasya#tvA saviqtuH pra#saqvE$&SvinO$ rbAqhuByA$M pUqShNO hastA$ByAq(gm)q sara#svatyai vAqcO yaqntu ryaqntrENAqgnEstvAq sAmrA$jyEnAqBiShi#~jcAqmIndra#syaq bRuhaqspatE$stvAq sAmrA$jyEnAqBiShi#~jcAmi || 42
(raqyi(gm)-sa#viqtAraq(gm)q-ShaTtri(gm)#Sacca) (A10)
